description.content:
Looking for an Advanced WordPress Developer for Responsive Custom WP Website Design to elevate your business?


With 7+ years of expertise in website design & development, I offer top-notch service keeping up with the latest trends. I specialize in creating modern, responsive, SEO-friendly websites tailored to various industries, ensuring your online platform's growth & success.


Being a WordPress specialist I've expertise in most WP Page Builders i.e. Elementor, Elementor Pro, Divi, Oxygen, Avada, WPBakery, along with all WordPress Themes.


EXPERTISE

  • WordPress Design & Redesign
  • Real Estate, Business, E-commerce Websites
  • WooCommerce Online Stores
  • Elementor, Figma, UI/UX Design
  • Landing Page & Blogs
  • Theme & Plugin Customization
  • WordPress Backup, Migration, Security
  • Performance Optimization & Maintenance
  • Bug Fixes, HTML5,PHP,CSS3, JavaScript issues
  • Proficiency with Git


SERVICES IN GIG

  • Complete Website Development
  • Mobile-Friendly, Responsive Design
  • Fast, Secure, SEO-Optimized Site
  • Attractive Pop-Ups
  • Newsletter & Mailchimp Integration
  • Google Analytics & Facebook Pixel
  • Wp Bug Fixes
  • Payment Gateway integrate
  • API Integration
  • Wp Themes & Plugins Installation


PLACEHOLDER GIG

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No but we can guide you through the best options for your project including where, how to purchase. We then can install and configure as part of the project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do we need to have a zoom call on each step?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, a zoom call can be requested on any step but is not necessary. I will provide status updates on each step and in most cases it's better to have your response in writing so as to be able to cross-reference any changes.
